subject: Sports Injuries
Basketball
lead_paragraph: The All-Star center Brook Lopez broke the fifth metatarsal in his right foot, an injury he had sustained before. The Nets said a timetable for his return would be better known next week.
snippet: The All-Star center Brook Lopez broke the fifth metatarsal in his right foot, an injury he had sustained before. The Nets said a timetable for his return would be better known next week.
